mapper.select:
SELECT id, template_id, datasource_id, datasource_type, module_name, check_step, table_name, pro_table_name, field_name, field_aggregate, check_rule_type, threshold_value, run_time_cron, check_consanguinity, module_type, module_rule, module_state, create_time, create_user FROM tb_datacheck_module WHERE del_flag = 1 AND table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND module_name LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
